repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Kathy Andrade Collection of ILGWU and UNITE Quilts Memorabilia
did.abstract: This collection is made up of 4 hand made quilts. Three of these quilts are made up of collections of pictures taken of UNITE and ILGWU rallys. The fourth quilt is made up of small replicas of (doll size) dresses and outfits.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is made up of 4 hand made quilts. Three of these quilts are made up of collections of pictures taken of UNITE and ILGWU rallys. The fourth quilt is made up of small replicas of (doll size) dresses and outfits.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Kathy Andrade Collection of ILGWU and UNITE Quilts Memorabilia #6299 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
